cta.title: More Than Machines. It's About People.

items.question: How can I reduce unplanned downtime at my plant?
items.answer: Tractian uses AI-powered sensors that continuously monitor your machines' vibration, temperature, and other parameters. When anomalies are detected, you get early alerts — so you can plan repairs before a breakdown happens.

items.question: Can I prove ROI using Tractian?
items.answer: Absolutely. Tractian tracks downtime avoided, maintenance costs, work order completion rates, and more. You can export detailed reports to leadership showing exactly how much time and money you're saving.

items.question: How hard is it to install and start using Tractian?
items.answer: Installation is quick and non-invasive. Our team handles the sensor setup and software configuration, and most plants are up and running within days — not months.

items.question: Can Tractian really help if my team is understaffed?
items.answer: Yes. Tractian automates work order creation, prioritizes tasks by criticality, and reduces manual inspections. Your team focuses on what matters most instead of fighting fires.

items.question: Do I need to replace my current systems to use Tractian?
items.answer: No. Tractian integrates with your existing tools — including SAP, Oracle, and other CMMS platforms. We work alongside your current setup, not against it.

items.question: How does Tractian support compliance and audit preparation?
items.answer: Every maintenance action, sensor reading, and work order is automatically logged. You get a full audit trail with timestamps and accountability, making compliance reviews straightforward.

items.question: What kind of reporting does Tractian offer?
items.answer: From high-level executive dashboards to granular asset-level analytics. Filter by site, area, asset type, failure mode, or timeframe — and export data for reviews, budgets, and board presentations.

items.question: Is Tractian easy for technicians to use?
items.answer: Very. The mobile app is intuitive and built for the shop floor. Technicians can view tasks, log work, and access SOPs in just a few taps — no extensive training needed.

items.question: What kind of support is included with Tractian?
items.answer: White-glove support from day one. You get a dedicated team for installation, training, and ongoing optimization. We're on site when it matters and always available remotely.

items.question: Can I use Tractian across multiple sites?
items.answer: Yes. Tractian's multi-site architecture lets you monitor and manage all your facilities from a single dashboard, with standardized processes across every location.

items.question: What types of machines or equipment does Tractian work with?
items.answer: Tractian works with virtually any rotating or critical equipment — motors, pumps, compressors, fans, conveyors, and more. If it moves or vibrates, we can monitor it.

items.question: Does Tractian require Wi-Fi or internal networks?
items.answer: Tractian sensors use their own connectivity (cellular/LoRa), so you don't need to depend on your plant's Wi-Fi or IT infrastructure.

items.question: Can Tractian help with standardizing processes across teams?
items.answer: Yes. With built-in SOPs, templates, and automated workflows, you can ensure every team follows the same procedures regardless of site or shift.

items.question: Can I migrate my existing maintenance data?
items.answer: Yes. Our implementation team helps you migrate historical data from spreadsheets, legacy CMMS systems, or other tools so you don't lose any institutional knowledge.

items.question: Does Tractian integrate with my existing tools?
items.answer: Yes. Tractian integrates with SAP, Oracle NetSuite, Power BI, and many other enterprise platforms via APIs and native connectors.

items.question: Is Tractian secure?
items.answer: Tractian is SOC 2 Type II certified, ISO 27001 compliant, and follows enterprise-grade security practices including encryption, access controls, and regular penetration testing.

items.question: How much does Tractian cost?
items.answer: Pricing depends on the number of assets, sensors, and modules you need. Contact us for a custom quote based on your plant's size and requirements.
